verses.verse: Open <S%H6605><s%> your doors, <S%H1817><s%> O Lebanon, <S%H3844><s%> that the fire <S%H784><s%> may devour <S%H398><s%> your cedars. <S%H730><s%>

Howl, <S%H3213><s%> fir <S%H1265><s%> tree; for the cedar <S%H730><s%> is fallen; <S%H5307><s%> because <S%H834><s%> the mighty <S%H117><s%> are spoiled: <S%H7703><s%> howl, <S%H3213><s%> O you oaks <S%H437><s%> of Bashan; <S%H1316><s%> for the forest <S%H3293><s%> of the vintage <S%H1208><s%> is come <S%H3381><s%> down. <S%H3381><s%>

There is a voice <S%H6963><s%> of the howling <S%H3213><s%> of the shepherds; <S%H7462><s%> for their glory <S%H155><s%> is spoiled: <S%H7703><s%> a voice <S%H6963><s%> of the roaring <S%H7581><s%> of young <S%H3715><s%> lions; <S%H3715><s%> for the pride <S%H1347><s%> of Jordan <S%H3383><s%> is spoiled. <S%H7703><s%>
Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> my God; <S%H430><s%> Feed <S%H7462><s%> the flock <S%H6629><s%> of the slaughter; <S%H2028><s%>

Whose <S%H834><s%> possessors <S%H7069><s%> slay <S%H2026><s%> them, and hold <S%H816><s%> themselves not guilty: <S%H816><s%> and they that sell <S%H4376><s%> them say, <S%H559><s%> Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> for I am rich: <S%H6238><s%> and their own shepherds <S%H7462><s%> pity <S%H2550><s%> them not.

For I will no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> pity <S%H2550><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> but, see, I will deliver <S%H4672><s%> the men <S%H120><s%> every <S%H376><s%> one <S%H376><s%> into his neighbor's <S%H7453><s%> hand, <S%H3027><s%> and into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of his king: <S%H4428><s%> and they shall smite <S%H3807><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> and out of their hand <S%H3027><s%> I will not deliver <S%H5337><s%> them.

And I will feed <S%H7462><s%> the flock <S%H6629><s%> of slaughter, <S%H2028><s%> even <S%H3651><s%> you, O poor <S%H6041><s%> of the flock. <S%H6629><s%> And I took <S%H3947><s%> to me two <S%H8147><s%> staves; <S%H4731><s%> the one <S%H259><s%> I called <S%H7121><s%> Beauty, <S%H5278><s%> and the other <S%H259><s%> I called <S%H7121><s%> Bands; <S%H2256><s%> and I fed <S%H7462><s%> the flock. <S%H6629><s%>

Three <S%H7969><s%> shepherds <S%H7462><s%> also I cut <S%H3582><s%> off in one <S%H259><s%> month; <S%H3391><s%> and my soul <S%H5315><s%> loathed <S%H7114><s%> them, and their soul <S%H5315><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> abhorred <S%H973><s%> me.

Then said <S%H559><s%> I, I will not feed <S%H7462><s%> you: that that dies, <S%H4191><s%> let it die; <S%H4191><s%> and that that is to be cut <S%H3582><s%> off, let it be cut <S%H3582><s%> off; and let the rest <S%H7604><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> every <S%H802><s%> one <S%H802><s%> the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of another. <S%H7468><s%>

And I took <S%H3947><s%> my staff, <S%H4731><s%> even <S%H853><s%> Beauty, <S%H5278><s%> and cut <S%H1438><s%> it asunder, that I might break <S%H6565><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I had made <S%H3772><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> the people. <S%H5971><s%>

And it was broken <S%H6565><s%> in that day: <S%H3117><s%> and so <S%H3651><s%> the poor <S%H6041><s%> of the flock <S%H6629><s%> that waited <S%H8104><s%> on me knew <S%H3045><s%> that it was the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And I said <S%H559><s%> to them, If <S%H518><s%> you think <S%H5869><s%> good, <S%H2896><s%> give <S%H3051><s%> me my price; <S%H7939><s%> and if <S%H518><s%> not, forbear. <S%H2308><s%> So they weighed <S%H8254><s%> for my price <S%H7939><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> pieces of silver. <S%H3701><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to me, Cast <S%H7993><s%> it to the potter: <S%H3335><s%> a goodly <S%H145><s%> price <S%H3365><s%> that I was priced <S%H3365><s%> at of them. And I took <S%H3947><s%> the thirty <S%H7970><s%> pieces of silver, <S%H3701><s%> and cast <S%H7993><s%> them to the potter <S%H3335><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Then I cut <S%H1438><s%> asunder my other <S%H8145><s%> staff, <S%H4731><s%> even <S%H853><s%> Bands, <S%H2256><s%> that I might break <S%H6565><s%> the brotherhood <S%H264><s%> between <S%H996><s%> Judah <S%H3063><s%> and Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to me, Take <S%H3947><s%> to you yet <S%H5750><s%> the instruments <S%H3627><s%> of a foolish <S%H196><s%> shepherd. <S%H7462><s%>

For, see, I will raise <S%H6965><s%> up a shepherd <S%H7462><s%> in the land, <S%H776><s%> which shall not visit <S%H6485><s%> those that be cut <S%H3582><s%> off, neither <S%H3808><s%> shall seek <S%H1245><s%> the young <S%H5288><s%> one, nor <S%H3808><s%> heal <S%H7495><s%> that that is broken, <S%H7665><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> feed <S%H3557><s%> that that stands <S%H5324><s%> still: but he shall eat <S%H398><s%> the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of the fat, <S%H1277><s%> and tear <S%H6561><s%> their claws <S%H6541><s%> in pieces.

Woe <S%H1945><s%> to the idol <S%H457><s%> shepherd <S%H7473><s%> that leaves <S%H5800><s%> the flock! <S%H6629><s%> the sword <S%H2719><s%> shall be on his arm, <S%H2220><s%> and on his right <S%H3225><s%> eye: <S%H5869><s%> his arm <S%H2220><s%> shall be clean <S%H2889><s%> dried <S%H3001><s%> up, and his right <S%H3225><s%> eye <S%H5869><s%> shall be utterly darkened. <S%H3543><s%>
